IV.i.2.A.1.a
.
Who May Request an Examination
Development activity personnel have the primary responsibility for requesting examinations.
The rating activity may provide guidance as necessary and also has authority to request examinations.
In addition, a Veterans Service Center Manager (VSCM), Pension Management Center Manager (PMCM), or designee may authorize an examination in any case in which they believe it is warranted.
